html:
Feb 25 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including BAE Systems, Harbour Energy and Totalenergies, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* BAE Systems BAES.L: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* Harbour Energy Plc HBR.L: Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Moneysupermarket.com MONY.L: Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Storskogen Group AB (Publ) STORb.ST: JP Morgan cuts to underweight from neutral

* Totalenergies SE TTEF.PA: RBC cuts to sector perform from outperform

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: JP Morgan cuts target price to CHF 50 from CHF 55
